response.original_title: The Timeless Nat King Cole Shows
response.overview: In its two short years on the air. NBC’s The Nat “King” Cole Show made classic-TV history. Along with Nat Cole’s classical pop vocals and sharp piano playing, these performances gathered from those great broadcasts feature special guests from the world of jazz such as Ella Fitzgerald and Stan Getz.
response.tagline: The Timeless Nat King Cole Shows
response.title: The Timeless Nat King Cole Shows
